context: I bailed on our plans at the last minute
letters:
Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to sincerely apologize for bailing on our plans at the last minute. I realize that my sudden change of plans likely caused you disappointment, and for that, I am truly sorry.

It was not my intention to let you down or disrupt the time we had set aside to enjoy together. Unfortunately, unforeseen circumstances arose that I couldn't control, and it ultimately forced me to make a difficult decision. I understand how important it is to honor commitments, and I regret not communicating with you sooner.

I value our friendship and the time we spend together, and I would love the opportunity to reschedule our plans when it is convenient for you. Please let me know if you'd be open to that, as I genuinely enjoy our time together and would hate for this situation to affect our relationship.

Thank you for your understanding, and once again, I apologize for any upset I caused. I appreciate your patience and hope to hear from you soon.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
